sense.name: Cause to move forward with force.
sense.commentary: Syntax is: NP1[concrete] PROPEL NP2[concrete] NOTE: Includes only instances related to direct forward motion..
sense.examples: Steam propels this ship. The rocket was propelled skyward. Molecules are autonomously propelled by polymerizing DNA strands.

sense.name: Give an incentive for action.
sense.commentary: Syntax is: NP1[concrete] PROPEL NP2[animate] NP1[abstract] PROPEL NP2[animate] NOTE: This includes metaphorical uses of sense 1. No actual forward motion occurs.
sense.examples: She was propelled into acting by her mother. This propelled me to sacrifice my career. The large sum propelled him to action.
